name: Void Infinity (Demo v2.0)
description:
--Controls-- Move- WSAD Pause- Space
Fire- Left Click

Dash- Right Click

SpaceBar- Pause

If you get a "memory error" plz let me know.. still working out the kinks, but refreshing the page should fix that ;>

This is my 1st project so feedback is very much appreciated. More features to come!

--Update 2.1 will include--
-Asteroids
-Updated Sfx and Vfx
-2 New enemy types

Thanks for playing!
